title: 有冇Bio 撚可以講解下mrna同dna replication?

replies.msg:
是咁的，岩先叫到呢度有條友話mrna疫苗可能會改變到dna 。 雖然極度on9, 但非bio出身 science撚想問下比較微觀既野:

Wiki 好快咁睇過下dna replication(dna複製), 有冇bio 撚可以話我聽我有冇理解錯(廢時班陰毛撚唔識英文，盡量用中文寫)

1. 酵素打斷雙螺旋結構
2.兩條dna 鏈中既一條dna鏈可以由頭到尾一條龍倒模咁複製
另一條要分段複製， 其中有 rna Primer 幫手,暫時同dna鏈結合黎stabilize dna? 但最後都會比dna 取代番(唯一涉及rna既部分，但都唔會影響到dna序列?)
3.係酵素作用下兩條新既dna 鏈合番做雙螺旋

另外， 基因治療都係靠影響dna既複製, 黎改變dna序列?

首先你要搞清楚, mRNA疫苗完全唔關DNA事,
pfizer隻疫苗唔會入細胞核, 更加唔會搞到入面既DNA,
然後你要知基本concept, 平時你身體係點做有用途既蛋白質,
DNA->mRNA->protein,
平時係好似你講咁由DNA整mRNA再整protein,
而mRNA疫苗係直接打mRNA入身體去整protein, 唔需要用到DNA,
至於係咩protein, 就係可以拎黎識別COVID19病毒既抗原, 拎黎引起身體免疫反應, 再從而做出相對既抗體

nyt有簡化過程可以參考下
https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2020/health/pfizer-biontech-covid-19-vaccine.html

mrna 係影響唔到dna
除非有逆轉錄酶在場
即係愛滋病毒之類

反而牛津果隻唔肯定會唔會影響DNA
因為腺病毒係DNA病毒
會入到細胞核
而腺病毒係可以用作基因治療 即係改基因
上網睇好多都係避重就輕講mrna唔影響基因
唔講腺病毒

希望有專家解答

我知mrna有咩用，但dna replication 係咪好似我理解2既一樣?

replies.msg:
dna replication is to replicate or copy dna. or one double helix to 2 double helices. this process likely happens in cell division or reproduction.

mRNA is a messager of course as it carries encoded information in dna. dna is transcripted into mRNA of particular gene. then mrna gets out of the nucleus and works wirh ribosomes and other cytoplasmic organelles to produce protein. then the protein is either utilized inside the cell or transported out thro cell membrane to be further processed for it's intended functions.

we can see mRNA can help to produce the needed protein and in this case the spike protein of coronavirus. the protein then incite needed immune responses.

however, the mRNA molecule is itself a macromolecule that can incite its own immune responses and other biological responses as well.

coronavirus and other rna virus actually carry a rna molecule not dna inside the protein coat of the virus particle. once infected, the viral rna will get into the cell and turn into a dna, then get into nucleus and potentially integrate that dna fragment into the host cell's dna body.

therefore, there are many spots in the whole viral life cycle to intercept the process to stop viral growth. but if considering vaccine approach the spike protein is picked.

I read from wiki that the viral DNA is able to transcribe but not able to replicate. What's the reasons of the inability of  replication?

replies.msg: that s the concept of cellular parasite or symbiosis, not sure at the moment.  like mitochondria was thought to be a form of archaic bacteria after differentiated lives inside other cells.  not sure if all integrated viral dna cannot be replicated along with host dna body.  pls suggest source.  virus is thought to be a molecular parasite.

quote.msg: viral dna will integrate into host dna body, then will transcribe the viral protein  through the host cellular mechanism.
I read from wiki that the viral DNA is able to transcribe but not able to replicate. What's the reasons of the inability of  replication?

that s the concept of cellular parasite or symbiosis, not sure at the moment.  like mitochondria was thought to be a form of archaic bacteria after differentiated lives inside other cells.  not sure if all integrated viral dna cannot be replicated along with host dna body.  pls suggest source.  virus is thought to be a molecular parasite.

replies.msg:
found the answer

https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15769613/
First-generation vectors were initially considered to be incapable of viral DNA replication, but it is necessary to delete one or more of the genes, all in the E2 transcription unit, that encode proteins essential for Ad DNA replication to completely eliminate viral DNA replication

quote.msg: I read from wiki that the viral DNA is able to transcribe but not able to replicate. What's the reasons of the inability of  replication?

that s the concept of cellular parasite or symbiosis, not sure at the moment.  like mitochondria was thought to be a form of archaic bacteria after differentiated lives inside other cells.  not sure if all integrated viral dna cannot be replicated along with host dna body.  pls suggest source.  virus is thought to be a molecular parasite.

found the answer

https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15769613/
First-generation vectors were initially considered to be incapable of viral DNA replication, but it is necessary to delete one or more of the genes, all in the E2 transcription unit, that encode proteins essential for Ad DNA replication to completely eliminate viral DNA replication

replies.msg: and how long does the cells that are integrated by viral DNA will last in human body, when will they die and then replaced by the new cells?

Gene therapy / nucleus acid therapy唔一定係改DNA replication過程
可以擺個plasmid DNA落去暫時supplement無咗嘅protein又得
整antisense oligonucleotide整停mRNA->protein嘅translation又得
仲有siRNA / miRNA
當然都仲可以用CRISPR去edit真正DNA

其實要啲藥deliver到入nucleus係好難
所以啲researcher先係咁搵個好嘅vector將啲野送入nucleus
用腺病毒係其中一個方法，因為病毒本身就識搵路入nucleus用人dna做replication
所以理論上牛津隻adenovirus反而可能入到nucleus引致insertions mutagenesis
都未論到Pfizer嗰度

請賜教

利申 打咗biontech

以前第一個做gene therapy嘅人Jesse Gelsinger打完針4日就死於multiple organ failure
佢個case係用adenovirus做vector
不過係20年前嘅事
當時令好多scientist對基因治療卻步

想知而家科技改良咗所以係咪唔會affect self DNA?

以前仲有一個bubble boy syndrome嘅trial
又係用retrovirus做載體做gene therapy
但side effect係班bb醫好，但有好幾個都血癌
就係因為insertional mutagenesis switch on咗oncogene

上網睇好多都係避重就輕講mrna唔影響基因
唔講腺病毒

希望有專家解答
唔會, 睇過佢地D專家既presentation講過

以前第一個做gene therapy嘅人Jesse Gelsinger打完針4日就死於multiple organ failure
佢個case係用adenovirus做vector
不過係20年前嘅事
當時令好多scientist對基因治療卻步

想知而家科技改良咗所以係咪唔會affect self DNA?

以前仲有一個bubble boy syndrome嘅trial
又係用retrovirus做載體做gene therapy
但side effect係班bb醫好，但有好幾個都血癌
就係因為insertional mutagenesis switch on咗oncogene

replies.msg:
睇呢篇話Adenovirus唔會改到DNA喎，因為無需要既enzyme

Adenoviruses -- even as they occur in nature -- just do not have the capacity to alter DNA. Unlike retroviruses such as HIV or lentiviruses, wild-type adenoviruses do not carry the enzymatic machinery necessary for integration into the host cell's DNA. That's exactly what makes them good vaccine platforms for infectious diseases, according to Coughlan.

replies.msg:
係喎，仲有一樣唔記得，係遺傳畀個細胞嘅後代唔係人嘅後代
除非 integrate 咗入 germ cells

就算係打DNA入cell都有兩種
一種係dna exist as extrachromosomal 即係plasmid, free oligo..etc
問題係會隨時間degrade 就算打落stem cell都唔會keep得永久
另一種就係會integrate落genome
上面大家講用lentivirus就係會
有個問題係integration係冇得好precise咁控制個位置
所以有機會影響其他gene


所以宜家CRISPR最好嘅地方就係有guiding mechanism 去控制修改邊到嘅DNA

而上面話會唔會傳俾後代係視乎modify嘅係somatic cell定Germline cells

就算RNA somehow可以reverse transcibe返做DNA
DNA係唔會自己有能力integrate落Genome
Foreign DNA係cell到好快會degrade
所以討論mRNA vaccine會否正引致有DNA change
應該冇乜可能

quote.msg:
Gene therapy / nucleus acid therapy唔一定係改DNA replication過程
可以擺個plasmid DNA落去暫時supplement無咗嘅protein又得
整antisense oligonucleotide整停mRNA->protein嘅translation又得
仲有siRNA / miRNA
當然都仲可以用CRISPR去edit真正DNA

其實要啲藥deliver到入nucleus係好難
所以啲researcher先係咁搵個好嘅vector將啲野送入nucleus
用腺病毒係其中一個方法，因為病毒本身就識搵路入nucleus用人dna做replication
所以理論上牛津隻adenovirus反而可能入到nucleus引致insertions mutagenesis
都未論到Pfizer嗰度

請賜教

利申 打咗biontech

replies.msg: agreed.  as biontech proxess jumped a few steps in the overall DNA-protein cycle and theoretically less intrusive.  however, the risk of injecting a mRNA fragment thus incite immune response against the macromolecule cannot be ruled out.  of course the oxford one also a rna virus enclosed in a viral shell.  the biontech is packaged in just a lipid vesicle thus more accessible to immune system scrutiny during delivery.
